attributes.action: Remove any mp that won’t honour the referendum in it’s truest form a no deal
attributes.additional_details: David Cameron said that if leave won the referendum parliament would respect the result and wouldn’t seek to compromise the result in any way and no renegotiation with Europe!
attributes.background: Petition to remove mp’s from office that don’t support Brexit in the way leave was described out of European Union and the single market e.g no deal

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
